alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cherokee, Gilmer, eastern Murray, northwestern Dawson, southeastern Gordon, Pickens, Fannin and northeastern Bartow Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Reliance to Tails Creek to Pine Log, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Cartersville, Jasper, Ellijay, Blue Ridge, Holly Springs, Ball Ground, Nelson, White, Waleska, East Ellijay, Morganton, Talking Rock, Buffington, Fairmount, Ranger, Amicalola Falls State Park, Hickory Flat, Jones Mill and Cohutta Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Cherokee; Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens
